Name: Midnight Stories
About the game: Midnight Stories NEW 19-JUN-2021: THE STORY HAS NOW 5 EPISODES!!! and more voices will be available soon Three episodes that Include: voice audio (only in episode 1), animations, 4K renders and a lot of options that lead to different paths. STORY This game has five episodes and consists of images and text / choices. Explore each unique episode with its own characteristics. In episode one you can choose between more voices to enjoy a sensual narration. The second episode has more choices and it has three people as main cast. One man and two women are eager to let you discover all the possible paths. The third episode is the longest and most complex and has more than 90 choices. FEATURES 3840 x 2160 pixel (4K UHDTV) resolution original renders created with 3D photorealistic software voice acting (when available) by professionals high quality soundtrack a huge number of choices and path options (around 100 individual menus) replay friendly as different choices lead to different endings image gallery included in the img subfolder of the game Disclaimer The characters in this game are all over 18 years old. They are adults (grown-up). The content of this game is purely fictitious and has no intention of showing or describing any real event, character or entity. If identical, it is purely coincidental.
